name: Defensive Combat Training
text: You excel at defending yourself from all manner of combat maneuvers.
benefit: You treat your total Hit Dice as your base attack bonus when calculating your Combat Maneuver Defense (see Combat).
staminaText: When targeted with a combat maneuver, you can spend any number of stamina points to gain a bonus to your CMD equal to the number of stamina points you spent.
mythicText: Your defensive capabilities in combat are unmatched.
mythicBenefit: Add half your tier to your CMD.
text_zh: 你善于在面对各种战技时保护自己。
benefit_zh: 你在计算战技防御时可以用你的总生命骰数代替BAB。
mythicText_zh: 你在战斗中的防御技巧十分强大。
mythicPrerequisites_zh: 防御式战斗训练，神话阶层4阶
mythicBenefit_zh: 将你的阶层的一半加到你的CMD上。
staminaText_zh: 你可花费任意点数耐力获得同等数量的CMD加值。
